name: Tom and Jerry: A Fundraising Adventure
summary:
《猫和老鼠》与BBC年度电视马拉松慈善活动"Children in Need"的合作短片，描述汤姆和杰瑞为该活动向BBC若干知名节目的主持人或虚拟角色筹款的故事。

Legendary cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry embark on a new adventure, all in the name of Pudsey. Look out for the familiar TV faces they meet along the way.

Tom and Jerry will be doing the rounds of some of the BBC's best loved programmes on Friday, encouraging stars like Len Goodman, Mary Berry and Gary Lineker to part with their cash.

Sent on their Children in Need fundraising mission by Terry Wogan, the cat and mouse will be performing before animated versions of the Strictly judges, popping into the Queen Vic, picking up football tips at Match of the Day, braving The Apprentice boardroom and partaking of cake courtesy of Great British Bake Off.
